title: I can't buy the new skin for fizz
body: When the new Super Galaxy Fizz came out I wanted to buy it but it didn't show up in the store and when I went to the champion page it said that the skin was unavailable.

replies.body: Don't worry. You're not the only one with this problem, pretty sure developers are aware as well and are working on it. Just have to wait a bit and hopefully it will be out this week.
